attributes.action: encourage the British Olympic Committee to return the British olympic team colours to the traditional blue, white, and red hoops of Coe, Cram and Ovett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the past few Olympics the British team strips have moved from the iconic blue and red hoops on a plain white background to increasingly unrecognisable and bland 'designer' outfits. Let's use the London Olympics to return to the great British colours.
